trans-unit.source: You need to set a secret with minimum 10 characters in the extension configuration in order for this to work. This setting is mandatory.
The given secret does not equal the configured secret.
You need to set allowedIps in the extension configuration in order for this to work. This setting is mandatory.
The allowed IPs entered in the extension configuration do not match with the current IP.
There are no probes configured. You need to set probes for this to work.
There is at least one configured Probe, which does not implement the ProbeInterface.
There are no outputs configured. You need to set at least the "html" output, as this is the default output.
There is at leas one configured Output, which does not implement the OutputInterface.
There is no output format given like requested. Sorry.
The database connection named "%s" operates as expected.
Cannot connect to the database. Maybe check the database credentials?
The task with the uid "%s" last run sucessfully.
The database is not accessible. Not possible to fetch Scheduled Tasks. Maybe check the database credentials?
The task with the uid "%s" has failures.
Writing the cache configuration named "%s" was successful.
There was an error trying to test the cache configurations.
The cache configuration named "%s" is NOT writeable.
